sentence:
…Madam Speaker, I rise today conflicted about what is happening in our  government and across the country. Like many Americans, I find myself  frustrated with government that doesn't work, lines that are too long,  services that are too hard to navigate, and roads that don't get fixed.

This shouldn't be a partisan issue. All of us here today should be in…
